Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

properties.question: Based on the content, I diagnose someone as suffering from:
properties.description: The diagnosis made on this basis.
properties.correct_option: migraine, facial vascular pain, trigeminal neuralgia
